caption.p: Workflow of molecular docking analysis of phytochemicals present in P. amarus and A. paniculata with four proteins (S protein, 3CLpro, PLpro and RdRp) targets of SARS-CoV-2. The phytochemicals of the two plant species were obtained from PubChem ( https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov) database in SDF and MOL formats. The 3D structures of proteins available in protein data bank were retrieved ( www.rcsb.org). The detailed protocol is given in the material and methods
